name: Psyco Bird Mania
description:
Psyco Bird Mania is a school project that I achieve with Rémi Ansel.

Compatible with a game pad.

It's a runner game where you incarnate a Psyco Bird. That a strange species of carnovirous bird who like to eat.

One day the god of this world, the thunderbird, is infected with an eye parasite who can control him and his power. It uses it to destroy the world, leaving to your Spyco Bird noting to eat, except the god.

Join the Psyco Bird in a crazy run to save the world eat!
